title: Teacher
body:
Hello darling.
<<if !visited("Teacher.TakeBook")>>
    I would love to show you my prized book collection,
    but it is so far from complete I am afraid I can not do that.
    Except of course if you happen to have the last missing piece.
    It is a masterpiece of literature called "The Metamorphosis".
    Written by the great Franz Kafka.
    But what is a book worth if I can not have it,
    maybe there is not a single copy of it left...
    -> Is this the book you're looking for? <<if visited("Technician.GiveBook")>>
        [[Teacher.TakeBook]]
<<else>>
    Thank you so much for that book earlier.
    It is so good!
    The amout of interpretation I am able to get into every single line!
    Please leave alone with my interpretation for now.
<<endif>>

title: Teacher.TakeBook
body:
It is!
And it is even the first edition!
I could never just take this from you,
take this key from my key collection.
It must be ancient and it emmits some kind of dark energy,
but I am sure you can handle that.
Now excuse me while I inspect the newest book in my collection.
